mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MUSE_LIVE.PAYMENT_TB (school_id, service_id, payment_amount, payment_type) VALUES (#{school_id}, #{service_id}, #{payment_amount}, #{payment_type})
mapper.select: select IF(payment_amount >= 0 ,payment_amount, payment_amount * -1 ) as payment_amount, service_name from PAYMENT_TB PT join SERVICE_TB ST on PT.service_id = ST.service_id where school_id = #{school_id};
